data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kluge, Nikita J., Novikova, Eugenia A. (2017): Occurrence of Anafroptilum Kluge 2012 (Ephemeroptera: Baetidae) in Oriental Region. Zootaxa 4282 (3): 453-472, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4282.3.2|4 occurrences
